description:
The redevelopment of the site by the erection of units
for use within Class B1 of the Town and Country Planning
(Use Classes) Order 1987  as shown on drawing nos.
KT/10/01D  02B  03C  04C  05B  06B  07  08  09  10  11A.
revised on 30th March  21st April  9th June  2nd August
and 9th October  1989.
Appeal received against Condition 07 of permission.
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - Notwithstanding the details shown on the drawings hereby
    approved, details of the car parking, loading bay and
    servicing arrangements shall not be otherwise than as shall
    have been submitted to and approved by the Council before
    any work on the site is commenced.

Condition : 2 - The facing materials to be used on the building shall not
    be otherwise than as shall have been submitted to and
    approved by the Council before any work on the site is
    commenced.

Condition : 3 - All windows at 1st and 2nd floor of units 2, 3, and 4 shown
    on north elevation KT/10/04C shall be installed at a height
    above eye level.

Condition : 4 - The use hereby permitted shall not be carried out otherwise
    than between the hours of 8.00 am and 8.00 pm on Mondays to
    Fridays and 8.00 am and 1.00 pm on Saturdays. It shall not
    be carried out at any time on Sundays or Bank Holidays.

Condition : 5 - No process shall be carried on or machinery installed which
    is not such as could be carried on or installed in any
    residential area without detriment to the amenity of that
    area by reason of noise, vibration, smell, fumes, smoke,
    soot, ash, dust or grit.

Condition : 6 - No loading or unloading of goods,including fuel, by
    vehicles arriving at or departing from the premises shall
    be carried out otherwise than within the curtilage of the
    building.

Condition : 7 - An area of 408sq.m. (units 1, 2 and 3) shall be used only
    for light industrial use Class B1C and for no other purpose
    (including any other purpose within Class B1 of the
    Schedule of the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes)
    Order 1987 or in any provision equivalent to that Class in
    any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that
    Order.

Condition : 8 - the existing wall along the north boundary of the site
    which is about 4.5m in height shall be retained permanently.

Condition : 9 - The development shall be constructed in strict accordance
    with the drawings hereby approved.

Condition : 10 - So that the Council may be satisfied with the detailed
    traffic arrangements on the site.

Condition : 11 - To ensure that the Council may be satisfied with the
    external appearance of the building.

Condition : 12 - So that the Council may be satisfied that the development
    does not result in an unreasonable loss of privacy to
    adjoining residents to the detriment of their amenities.

Condition : 13 - 05 and 09 To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining
    premises and the area generally.

Condition : 14 - To avoid obstruction of the surrounding streets and to
    safeguard amenities of adjacent premises.

Condition : 15 - To ensure that the future occupation of the building shall
    be in accordance with the Council's policies for Employment
    and Economic activity as set out in the Written Statement
    of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 1987 (the
    Borough Plan).
Condition : 16 - To protect amenity of adjoining residents.
